author: Tony Tobin
method: For the guacamole, place all of the guacamole ingredients into a food processor and blend until smooth. For the tortillas, place the vegetable oil into a deep, heavy-bottomed saucepan and heat until a small cube of bread sizzles and turns golden when dropped into it. (CAUTION: hot oil can be dangerous. Do not leave unattended.) Carefully place the tortilla wedges into the hot oil and deep fry until golden-brown and crisp. Remove from the oil with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper. To serve, place the fried tortillas onto a serving plate with the guacamole in a small bowl alongside.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  1 smoked chipotle chilli, chopped (available at some supermarkets and from online suppliers),  Â½ avocado, peeled and stone removed,  1 lime, juice only,  handful fresh coriander, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  500ml/18fl oz vegetable oil, for deep frying,  4 ready-made flour tortillas, cut into 8 wedges
